What to deduct: Reduction in the value of taxable purchases for which a credit note has been received or a debit note has been issued
Example/details: Purchase returnsDiscount given by your supplier
context: completing-gst-returns             Box 5: Total value of taxable purchases

What to deduct: Value of taxable purchase where you need to repay the input tax claimed to the Comptroller of GST
Example/details: If you have not paid your supplier within 12 months from the due date of payment and have claimed input tax, you are required to repay the input tax claimed to the Comptroller of GST.Please refer to If I have claimed GST before paying my supplier for  more details.
context: completing-gst-returns             Box 5: Total value of taxable purchases
